title: Help...
body: I'm getting a something broke error, and its really annoying. Anytime I try to start a game, or spectate a game I get this error. its something with bugsplat

replies.body:
If you're running Windows 10, this could be caused by the *Game DVR* feature inside of the Windows Game Bar. I strongly recommend [disabling the feature entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it fixes the issue.

Let me know if it did.
